title: Not All about Cavendish: The Retirement Class of 2024 Includes Sprint Chauffeurs, Breakaway Ballers, and U.S. Speedsters
content:
We all know Cavendish is retiring this winter. But which other headliners are hanging up their wheels? Here's the closing instalment of a two-part tribute to the retirement class of '24.

Read the full article at Not All about Cavendish: The Retirement Class of 2024 Includes Sprint Chauffeurs, Breakaway Ballers, and U.S. Speedsters on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
